DD_Attribute_Full.name: reference_time_utc
DD_Attribute_Full.definition: reference_time_utc provides a date and time in UTC format. Given in a label when time values in a table are given as elapsed seconds offset from a reference time. Unless there are compelling reasons to do otherwise, reference_time_utc should correspond to the start of a day. Required anytime a table field is given relative to a specific date and time other than when Barycentric Dynamical Time is used (e.g., observed_event_tdb).
